timeline.message:
[CDAP-16202] Add e2e tests for pipeline actions

  - Adds creating simple and complex pipeline as cypress command
  - Refactors pipeline studio spec based on newly added command
  - Removes base image from pipeline studio spec
  - Adds tests for pipeline actions (zoom, fit-to-screen & align)
  - Adds base & actual snapshots for pipeline action test cases
  - Adds data-cy attribute for undo and redo pipeline action buttons
  - Adds data-cy attribute to app header to remove focus from pipeline action buttons
